title: Simulation-Based Visual Display System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics (linear algebra, geometry), basic programming concepts, and introduction to computer graphics
context.additional_context: Project-based activity in a digital device-provided environment, involving team-based simulation design and implementation of visual output systems.

learning_goals: Learners derive simulation requirements by applying a 3-tier visual display classification system reflecting human visual-cognitive characteristics
Learners utilize a decision-making framework to select optimal display components relative to budget constraints
Learners develop simulation prototypes incorporating real-world mathematical modeling through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
